orbitdata module¶

class orbitdata.OrbitData(agent_name: str, time_data: DataFrame, eclipse_data: DataFrame, position_data: DataFrame, isl_data: DataFrame, gs_access_data: DataFrame, gp_access_data: DataFrame, grid_data: DataFrame)[source]¶

Bases: object

Stores and queries data regarding an agent’s orbital data.

TODO: add support to load ground station agents’ data

find_gp_index(lat: float, lon: float)[source]¶

Returns the ground point and grid index to the point closest to the latitude and longitude given.

lat, lon must be given in degrees

from_directory()[source]¶

Loads orbit data from a directory containig a json file specifying the details of the mission being simulated. If the data has not been previously propagated, it will do so and store it in the same directory as the json file being used.

The data gets stored as a dictionary, with each entry containing the orbit data of each agent in the mission indexed by the name of the agent.
